title: Add version.properties file to your Android Project | by Danish Amjad | AndroidPub
contentText: Add version.properties file to your Android Project Change version name and version code from one file and reflect the changes on all the product flavors Danish Amjad Jan 18, 2019·2 min read Image Credits: https://www.bantex.co.za/product/polypropylene-lever-arch-files/ This story is from what I have learned today, As we all have the build variants in our project and In every product flavors we have version name and version code, whenever we published the build to the play store we increase our version code and version name and change in our all product flavor one by one….
contentHtml:
Add version.properties file to your Android Project

Change version name and version code from one file and reflect the changes on all the product flavors

Danish Amjad

Jan 18, 2019·2 min read

This story is from what I have learned today, As we all have the build variants in our project and In every product flavors we have version name and version code, whenever we published the build to the play store we increase our version code and version name and change in our all product flavor one by one….
